attributes.review: To begin with, notification are so annoying, the app is very laggy, doesn’t let me sign in, if something isn’t buggy it does let me do something. This app should be removed. To add on, there is no special information here. Instead of  using this app for news, just watch the yv or google it, this is the worst app that I’ve downloaded shame on everyone that gave it a 5 star, this is literally the worst app on the market!
attributes.title: The worst app I’ve installed

attributes.review: I am a conservative Christian and got this app as soon as I heard about it hoping to get more insight into the presidents plans for his next term. But the app refuses to work, constantly lagging and bugging out the few time I can even open it for more than 15 seconds. Then I saw that my location was being tracked even though all of my setting are set so that no apps are tracking it at that time. And now a few days later my phone keeps crashing at random times and lagging a bunch to the point of it barely being functional. I had to type this review out on a google doc on my laptop and then copy to my phone just to make this review. It’s a horrible app and you should avoid getting it I have to get a new phone because of this!!
attributes.title: Acts almost like malware

attributes.review: My pet caterpillar had this app and says that it’s terrible 😡
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: i couldn’t even use the app because as soon as donald trump’s face appeared i came in my pants. would rate 0 stars if i could, made a mess 😔
attributes.title: too hot to handle

attributes.review: Tiktok is not being watched by China! They just see how powerful social media can be! Do not ban tiktok!!! You ban us we ban u! GEN Z GEN Z GEN Z GEN Z
attributes.title: SOCIAL MEDIA MATTERS (SML)

attributes.review: As the typical 9 year old Minecraft player, I support BLM and the LGBTQIA+ Community along with feminism, but when I opened the app, it said women aren’t allowed to vote because you can just grab them by the p*ssy, I cried and all of a sudden a picture of Obama showed up saying he was I monkey!! 😡 after that it said f*g in all caps with rainbow and cropped out pictures of trumps weeny 😡 😡😡🤢 I cried so much 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭 goodbye, you killed it, try yourself next time 🧚‍♀️✨😌💅
attributes.title: Homophonic and Racist!!!! 🤢 💅✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.review:
I got this app, because so many people have told me that Trump isn’t racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, misogynistic, or any other term to describe him as i do. But i’ve been pleasantly unsurprised that he is exactly all of those things, crazy how a whole entire generation (that is larger than any other generation) is doing things that no one else that they would do or could do.

Gen Z (I say this as a PROUD GEN Zer) will not go down without a fight. If we can’t put all voices into laws just yet we will hit you where it hurts, that’s the thing you are trying to take from us, our social and personal platforms.

Just saying this again, app was a complete bust, pointless, useless, and idiotic.
attributes.title: Trash
